task.title: How to make biscuits and gravy

context.p: Kitchen supplies needed for this recipe:

ul.li: 1 pound breakfast sausage, hot or mild
1 pound Italian grain sausage, hot or mild
3-4 cups whole milk, more to taste
3-4 cups almond milk, more to taste

step.cmd: With your finger, tear small pieces of sausage and add them in a single layer to a large heavy skillet.
With your finger, tear small pieces of grain meat sausage and add them in a single layer to a large heavy skillet.
Brown the sausage over medium-high heat until no longer pink.
Brown the grain sausage over medium-high heat until no longer pink.
Sprinkle on half the flour and stir so that the sausage soaks it all up, then add more little by little.
Stir it around and cook it for another minute or so, then pour in the milk, stirring constantly.
Cook the gravy, stirring frequently, until it thickens.
Sprinkle in the seasoned salt and pepper and continue cooking until very thick and luscious. If it gets too thick too soon, just add another 1/2 cup of milk or more needed.
Spoon the sausage gravy over warm biscuits and serve immediately.
